StartNew %d:
You are for the first time in our system! Hello!
Your unique identifier: %d.

Now you can choose your language:
StartFound %d:
Your account was found in the system.
Your unique identifier: %d.

Also, if you want, you can change the language:
new_language: You have successfully changed your language to 🇬🇧 English.
no_your_schedules:
You haven't created any schedules yet.

 Choose 'Create schedule' from menu to create.
schedule_size_error: Name size must be from 3 to 16 characters
success_create_schedule %s %d:
You have successfully created a schedule named: %s.
Use a unique identifier to subscribe to a schedule: %d
enter_schedule_name: Enter the name you need from 3 to 16 characters.
schedule_owner_menu %s %d:
You have selected a schedule named: %s.
To subscribe to it for other users, use a unique identifier %d and use it in the 'My subscriptions' item.

Choose one of the actions:
schedule_wrong_id: ❌ Oh, something went wrong. Apparently the schedule has been deleted or changed.
